artist: Artist: James Sowerby; Author: Inscribed notes by Sir James Edward Smith; Publisher: Sir James Edward Smith
creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Plate 15, one of 18 hand-colored engravings of flowering plants by Sowerby
inscription: Various handwritten descriptions and notes in red pencil attributed to James Edward Smith, M.D. Hand-drawn border added in brown ink.
portfolio: From Icones pictae plantarum rariorum, descriptionibus et observationibus illustratae..., London, 1790-93
provenance: Dwight E. and Helen Minnich, Minneapolis; sold to MIA, 1966.
title: Epidendrum Barringtoniae (Large-flowered Epidendrum)
